sentences.sContent: From todays progress of transgenic animals, we can know there is great prospect of application in biological reactor and human apparatus transplant.
sentences.sContent_eng: From todays progress of transgenic animals, we can know there is great prospect of application in biological reactor and human apparatus transplant.
sentences.sCn: 从目前的发展来看，转基因动物在生物发生器、人类器官移植等方面有广阔的应用前景。

trans.tranCn: [遗] 转基因动物，转化的动物
